description:
Every strand of hair is meticulously inspected in this calligraphy brush. That’s one reason it costs about $1,000. And if you combine it with top-of-the-line inksticks, stones, and paper, calligraphy tools can set you back $8,000. So why would anyone spend so much just to write?
